stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Wealth Management Themed Email Leads to Credential Harvesting Website
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 23 October 2013, a phishing email claiming to have documents concerning wealth management contains an embedded link leading to a credential harvesting website.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
This is a phishing email that contains an embedded link. When clicked, the link takes the user to a credential harvesting website.
---BEGIN EMAIL BODY--- Hi,
I think it's worth your time to review this, click the link below and log in to view Google document:
Click here
Regards
NOTE: This is a general message I'm sending to my contact list, to enlighten friends and family on wealth management, so feel free to login and view document for your financial enlightenment. ---END EMAIL BODY---
---BEGIN EMAIL HEADER--- Received: X-IronPort-AV: E=Sophos;i="4.93,553,1378854000"; d="scan'208";a="32939677" Received: X_BAE_IN_WARNING: True X-IronPort-Anti-Spam-Filtered: true X-IronPort-Anti-Spam-Result: AspSAHydZ1JADI9Om2dsb2JhbAAjNg+CNGkTLSeJJR2iLDImilKDAYQpLoEZDgEBAQEBBgsUFIJEAU8BATgdASoBd4YGgX0BAw8EAQiNKJlRgSADBYMrAQUFhDUBSgOJbwaPZwGCZiaBC45uMIodhQiJfIQ+AlSBTgcLAQUFASI X-IPAS-Result: AspSAHydZ1JADI9Om2dsb2JhbAAjNg+CNGkTLSeJJR2iLDImilKDAYQpLoEZDgEBAQEBBgsUFIJEAU8BATgdASoBd4YGgX0BAw8EAQiNKJlRgSADBYMrAQUFhDUBSgOJbwaPZwGCZiaBC45uMIodhQiJfIQ+AlSBTgcLAQUFASI X-IronPort-AV: E=Sophos;i="4.93,553,1378854000"; d="scan'208";a="322654700" with ESMTP/TLS/DHE-RSA-CAMELLIA256-SHA; 23 Oct 2013 10:59:33 +0100 X-SENDER-IP: 64.12.143.78 X-SENDER-REPUTATION: 5.5 Received: from omr-m04.mx.aol.com ([64.12.143.78]) by with ESMTP/TLS/ADH-AES256-SHA; 23 Oct 2013 09:59:33 +0000 Received: from mtaomg-da02.r1000.mx.aol.com (mtaomg-da02.r1000.mx.aol.com [172.29.51.138]) by omr-m04.mx.aol.com (Outbound Mail Relay) with ESMTP id D28A5700000A7; Wed, 23 Oct 2013 05:59:32 -0400 (EDT) Received: from core-doc001a.r1000.mail.aol.com (core-doc001.r1000.mail.aol.com [172.29.160.193]) by mtaomg-da02.r1000.mx.aol.com (OMAG/Core Interface) with ESMTP id CC41BE000082; Wed, 23 Oct 2013 05:59:31 -0400 (EDT) X-MB-Message-Source: WebUI Subject: For your review X-MB-Message-Type: User MIME-Version: 1.0 From: Sandra Wynne <sandraj44@aol.com> Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="--------MB_8D09DEDB44F0748_11F8_2F25_Webmail-d107.sysops.aol.com" X-Mailer: AOL Webmail 38121-BASIC Received: from 217.35.78.36 by Webmail-d107.sysops.aol.com (205.188.171.201) with HTTP (WebMailUI); Wed, 23 Oct 2013 05:59:31 -0400 Message-ID: <8D09DEDB44F0748-11F8-EA6@Webmail-d107.sysops.aol.com> X-Originating-IP: [217.35.78.36] Date: Wed, 23 Oct 2013 05:59:31 -0400 x-aol-global-disposition: G DKIM-Signature: v=1; a=rsa-sha256; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=mx.aol.com; s=20121107; t=1382522372; bh=3l7KmN9+5uK4EwTSOu/5E3xyMdg+gK+LiVPTNCm4Pzc=; h=From:Subject:Message-Id:Date:MIME-Version:Content-Type; b=LDMTq3uL9dyqQfl/jTghPfqK6wx6dsbb6afuxoku9uHLGWHispSIHeABdHG6rC+Xd ghzE6I0GN+kUGtl2frUIrcOs9VouCkx0Q9y47faYD0eccj0kQl/YpnKyfRzt5DdsbW 1mwYH+UW837DZNotXh0BfoCVRNFEQIeYKbFmu3Tc= x-aol-sid: 3039ac1d338a52679e0309fd To: Undisclosed recipients:; Return-Path: sandraj44@aol.com X-MS-Exchange-Organization-AuthSource: GLKXH0010V.GREENLNK.net X-MS-Exchange-Organization-AuthAs: Internal X-MS-Exchange-Organization-AuthMechanism: 10 X-MS-Exchange-Organization-AVStamp-Mailbox: MSFTFF;1;0;0 0 0 ---END EMAIL HEADER---

After clicking on this link, it directs the user to a webpage asking to "Choose your Email provider and Login". Then it asks for username and password. After a username and password are entered, it redirects the user to legitimate google docs.

This POST request is associated with the credential harvesting website.
---BEGIN POST REQUEST--- POST /googledoc/thanks.php HTTP/1.1 Accept: text/html, application/xhtml+xml, */* Referer: hxxp://quatangxinhxinh.vn/googledoc/ Accept-Language: en-US User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0) Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate Host: quatangxinhxinh.vn Content-Length: 83 Connection: Keep-Alive Cache-Control: no-cache ---END POST REQUEST---
